panels.description: The host's most recently reported uptime in human readable format

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${BUCKET}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${NAS_HOST}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "uptime")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => {
      // uptime_format is deprecated: https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/blob/59234e6/plugins/inputs/system/README.md?plain=1#L46
      // https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/blob/59234e6/plugins/inputs/system/system.go#L89
      uptime = r._value
      days = int(v: uptime / (60 * 60 * 24))
      uptimeFormatDays =
        if days > 1 then "${days} days, "
        else if days == 1 then "${days} day, "
        else ""
      seconds = int(v: uptime % 60)
      uptimeFormatSeconds = if seconds < 10 then "0${seconds}" else "${seconds}"
      minutes_ = uptime / 60
      hours = int(v: (minutes_ / 60) % 24)
      minutes = int(v: minutes_ % 60)
      uptimeFormatMinutes = if minutes < 10 then "0${minutes}" else "${minutes}"
      uptimeFormat = "${hours}:${uptimeFormatMinutes}:${uptimeFormatSeconds}"
      return { r with _value: "${uptimeFormatDays}${uptimeFormat}" }
  })

panels.title: Uptime

panels.description: The internal temperature of each drive

targets.query:
dsQuery = (bucket, start, stop) =>
from(bucket)
  |> range(start, stop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${NAS_HOST}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "smart_attribute")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "raw_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.name == "Temperature_Celsius")
  |> drop(columns: ["device"])
  |> toFloat()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
${dsPost}

panels.title: SSD/HDD Temperature

panels.description: Additional temperature sensors for each drive

targets.query:
dsQuery = (bucket, start, stop) =>
from(bucket)
  |> range(start, stop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${NAS_HOST}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "smart_attribute")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "raw_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.name =~ /(Temperature_Sensor_|Airflow_Temperature)/)
  |> drop(columns: ["device"])
  |> toFloat()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
${dsPost}

  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)

dsQuery = (bucket, start, stop) =>
from(bucket)
  |> range(start, stop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${NAS_HOST}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")

panels.description: Space used by each ZFS dataset (does not include child datasets)

targets.query:
dsQuery = (bucket, start, stop) =>
from(bucket)
  |> range(start, stop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${NAS_HOST}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "exec_zfs_list")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "referenced")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 1024 * 1024 * 100)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
${dsPost}

panels.title: Datasets Used Space

panels.description: Free space for each ZFS pool

targets.query:
dsQuery = (bucket, start, stop) =>
from(bucket)
  |> range(start, stop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${NAS_HOST}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "exec_zfs_list")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "available")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.name =~ /^[^\/]+$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
${dsPost}

panels.title: Pools Free Space

panels.description:
Number of unsafe shutdowns. This count is incremented when a
shutdown notification (CC.SHN) is not received prior to loss of power.

targets.query:
dsQuery = (bucket, start, stop) =>
from(bucket)
  |> range(start, stop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${NAS_HOST}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "smart_attribute")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "raw_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.name == "Unsafe_Shutdowns")
  |> drop(columns: ["device"])
  |> toFloat()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
${dsPost}

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "smart_attribute")

panels.title: Available Spare

panels.description:
A vendor specific estimate of the percentage of NVM subsystem life used
based on the actual usage and the manufacturerâ€™s prediction of NVM life. A value of 100 indicates that
the estimated endurance of the NVM in the NVM subsystem has been consumed, but may not indicate
an NVM subsystem failure. The value is allowed to exceed 100. Percentages greater than 254 shall be
represented as 255.

targets.query:
dsQuery = (bucket, start, stop) =>
from(bucket)
  |> range(start, stop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${NAS_HOST}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "smart_attribute")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "raw_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.name == "Percentage_Used")
  |> drop(columns: ["device"])
  |> toFloat()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
${dsPost}

panels.title: Percentage Used

panels.description:
Contains the amount of time in minutes that the controller
is operational and the temperature is greater than or equal to the Warning or Critical Composite
Temperature Threshold.

targets.query:
dsQuery = (bucket, start, stop) =>
from(bucket)
  |> range(start, stop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${NAS_HOST}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "smart_attribute")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "raw_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.name =~ /Temperature_Time/)
  |> drop(columns: ["device"])
  |> toFloat()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
${dsPost}

panels.title: Temperature Times

panels.description: A metric that shows the number of tasks currently executed by the CPU and tasks waiting in the queue (ideally it's lower than the number of CPUs on the system, e.g. <4 for a 4-core CPU)

targets.query:
dsQuery = (bucket, start, stop) =>
from(bucket)
  |> range(start, stop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${NAS_HOST}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^load\d/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: 
      if r._field == "load1" then "load  1"
      else if r._field == "load5" then "load  5" 
      else if r._field == "load15" then "load 15"
      else r._field
  }))
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
${dsPost}

panels.title: Load Averages

panels.description: CPU usage based on types of tasks (as reported by `top`)

targets.query:
dsQuery = (bucket, start, stop) =>
from(bucket)
  |> range(start, stop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${NAS_HOST}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.cpu == "cpu-total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /usage_(user|system|nice|iowait|irq|softirq)/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
${dsPost}

panels.title: CPU

targets.query:
dsQuery = (bucket, start, stop) =>
from(bucket)
  |> range(start, stop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${NAS_HOST}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mem" or r._measurement == "swap")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "used" or r._field == "active")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
${dsPost}

panels.description: Read and write operations involving a physical drive measured in bytes per second

targets.query:
dsQuery = (bucket, start, stop) =>
from(bucket)
  |> range(start, stop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${NAS_HOST}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.DEVTYPE == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "read_bytes" or r._field == "write_bytes")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> drop(columns: ["name", "DEVLINKS"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
${dsPost}

panels.title: Disk IO

panels.description: Network traffic per interface measured in bits per second

targets.query:
dsQuery = (bucket, start, stop) =>
from(bucket)
  |> range(start, stop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${NAS_HOST}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.interface =~ /enp.s0/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "bytes_recv" or r._field == "bytes_sent")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * 8.0 }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> rename(columns: {"bytes_recv": "recv", "bytes_sent": "sent"})
${dsPost}

panels.title: Throughput

panels.description: Unit counts for TCP/UDP connection states from the `netstat` command

targets.query:
dsQuery = (bucket, start, stop) =>
from(bucket)
  |> range(start, stop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${NAS_HOST}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "netstat")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
${dsPost}

panels.title: Netstat

list.description: Name of the InfluxDB bucket with telegraf metrics.
list.name: BUCKET
dsPost
